overview:
Randall Bal is the VP of Partner Development for Therapydia and is responsible for cultivating long-term growth from Therapydiaâ€™s partner clinics while managing and sustaining strategic oversight and development of Therapydia’s revenue model.

Prior to joining Therapydia, Randall was the Director of Corporate finance at Dealite.me where he was responsible for the strategic management and development of the Dealite.me’s social media/technology application and for driving revenue growth from marketing programs including launching new innovative product/solutions to the marketplace.

Randall has experience in healthcare strategy during his tenure at MedExpert International. As a VP of Business strategy, his responsibilities were to improve the cost and healthcare outcomes of the medical decision process while strengthening patient and physician relationships.

Born in northern California, Randall graduated from Stanford University earning his B.A. in psychology. Randall is sports enthusiast and is a World Champion and Two-Time World Record Holder in swimming. He enjoys his time, swimming, biking, and wake boarding.
